card_text: Target 1 "Stardust Dragon", or 1 Synchro Monster that mentions it, that you control, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Equip 1 face-up monster your opponent controls to that target.$N●It can attack directly this turn.$N●This turn, each time it destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK.$NYou can only activate 1 "Majestic Absorption" per turn.
